SPICaMusic Permissions Usage Statement
Welcome to SPICaMusic! To provide you with a complete music experience, we need you to grant the following permissions:
Required Permissions Explained
1. Storage Space/Media File Access Permission (Required)
Purpose: This permission is used to scan local audio files on your device to discover and add them to your music library, allowing you to play your favorite songs at any time.
Our Commitment: SPICaMusic will only access audio files on your device (such as MP3, FLAC, WAV, etc.). We will not access, modify, or upload your private photos, videos, documents, or other non-music files.
2. Notification Permission (Recommended)
Purpose: When you play music in the background, we need this permission to show you a persistent notification. This notification not only allows you to quickly view the currently playing song information but also provides convenient playback controls (such as play/pause, previous/next track).
Your Choice: If you do not grant this permission, background playback control may be limited or may not be displayed in the notification bar.
3. Network Access Permission (Required)
Purpose: To enrich your listening experience, SPICaMusic uses a network connection to fetch lyric information for songs and display them synchronously during playback.
Our Commitment: We only use the network when you need to fetch lyrics and will not engage in unnecessary background network activity or upload your personal data.
Privacy Protection Commitment
SPICaMusic respects and protects your personal privacy. We solemnly promise:
We will only use the permissions you grant within the scope of the functions declared above.
We will not collect, store, or share any sensitive information related to your personal identity.
We will not use your personal data for any commercial advertising or third-party sharing.
You can manage these permissions at any time in the system settings. If you have any questions about our permission usage or privacy policy, please contact us via [Your contact method, e.g., the "About" page in the app or a feedback email].
Thank you for your understanding and support! We hope SPICaMusic brings you an enjoyable music experience.
